thread.title: One More Plastic Surgery For That Actress?
thread.title_full: One More Plastic Surgery For That Actress?

title: One More Plastic Surgery For That Actress?
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Though it is offensive to talk about one's facial features, it is common in an industry which is majorly glamour driven. Especially in case of actresses, it is always beauty that is given first preference and talent plays only the second important role. 
On that note, An actress is playing a spoil sport with her own career, according to the film industry gossip lovers. This lady has been always been the point of the discussion for those rapid changes in her facial features, which almost differs from one film to another. 
And it looks like the beauty has again gone for a plastic surgery recently, which further distorted her face. The actress has become an over night star for the unusual charm she possessed and has won the hearts of many with her beautiful looks. 
However, she lacks that shine now and is only managing to fill her diary with her pre-attained fame and contacts in the industry. 
Although this managing skills of her might not work any longer since it is affecting her films and raising continuity issues. If a scene is shot today and the director goes for a continuation shoot of that scene, a month later, she might not look the same. 
Nevertheless, she is still an adorable angel for her fans and we can only give some time and see how she gets out this problems. After all she is known for her command on industry relations. Read more about: telugu
